Class# CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+

```
@MainActor
class CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement
```

## [Topics](/documentation/CarPlay/CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement#topics)

### [Initializers](/documentation/CarPlay/CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement#Initializers)

[`init(image: UIImage, imageShape: CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement.Shape, title: String, subtitle: String?, accessorySymbolName: String?)`](/documentation/carplay/cplistimagerowitemcondensedelement/init(image:imageshape:title:subtitle:accessorysymbolname:))Initialize a list image row condensed element with an image, an image shape, a title, subtitle and a system symbol name.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/CarPlay/CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement#Instance-Properties)

[`var accessorySymbolName: String?`](/documentation/carplay/cplistimagerowitemcondensedelement/accessorysymbolname)The name of the system symbol image to use as accessory.[`var imageShape: CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement.Shape`](/documentation/carplay/cplistimagerowitemcondensedelement/imageshape)Shape used to draw the image of the element.[`var subtitle: String?`](/documentation/carplay/cplistimagerowitemcondensedelement/subtitle)The subtitle associated with this element.[`var title: String`](/documentation/carplay/cplistimagerowitemcondensedelement/title)The title associated with this element.### [Enumerations](/documentation/CarPlay/CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement#Enumerations)

[`enum Shape`](/documentation/carplay/cplistimagerowitemcondensedelement/shape)Types of shape used to draw a condensed row element.## [Relationships](/documentation/CarPlay/CPListImageRowItemCondensedElement#relationships)
